'''Retracing Bolide''' is an [[Artifact Set]] available at [[:Category:4-Star Artifacts|4-star]] and [[:Category:5-Star Artifacts|5-star]] rarities which can be obtained from [[Domain of Guyun]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*2-Piece Bonus:
** [[Shield Strength]] refers to a character's attribute, therefore the two-piece bonus of Retracing Bolide only affects the character wearing the artifact.
** Shields from a character with the artifact can't transfer the increased shield strength to another.
** Any existing shields will be strengthened when the character with the set bonus takes the field.
